assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: All phenotypic data were recorded as part of routine dairy cattle management and genetic evaluations. The DNA samples were obtained for the purpose of routine genomic evaluations in previous projects. Thus, no additional animal handling or experiment was performed specifically for this study.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare that they have no conflict of interest.

funder.name: Milk Production Levy Fund; Fund for Organic Farming
